roasts.name: The Tide
roasts.tasting_notes:
At relatively cool 198F and relatively low 1:1.5 ratio, heavy body, burnt sugar sweetness, velvety chocolatey finish. Adjust parameters to find the crème brûlée, it's in there (usually). Ages gracefully into a less-complex chocolatey treat.

One of my all time favorite espresso coffees so far.
